title.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Tejaswini Rural Women's Empowerment Programme

description.narrative: The overall goal of the programme is to enable poor women to make use of choices, spaces and opportunities in the economic, social and political spheres for their improved well-being. This will be achieved through four purpose (immediate) level objectives of: (a) creation of strong and sustainable SHGs, and SHG apex organizations who provide their members with economic and social support; (b) provide access to savings, credit and insurance services, and build up financial security; (c) opportunities for new and improved livelihood opportunities, with enterprises established or expanded, and market linkages and support services; and (d) access to functional education and social services, labour-saving infrastructure, and participation in local governance. In addition the programme will aim to support and promote government policies that empower women and develop the capacity of MAVIM and WFDC to improve the livelihoods of poor women.

name.narrative: Credit and Financial Services: Tejaswini Rural Women's Empowerment Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
